metadata.title: CVE-2024-44944 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: ctnetlink: use helper function to calculate expect IDDelete expectation path is missing a call to the nf_expect_get_id()helper function to calculate the expectation ID, otherwise LSB of theexpectation object address is leaked to userspace.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-44944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
